    Peojects

    • EndoLink
      Research project with Dr. Sina Ahmadi at George Mason University.
      Aim of this project is finding all names of a specific location and extend more names to a specific location in different languages.
      Privte Repository 2021 - current
    • KurdNet
      Research project with Dr. Sina Ahmadi at George Mason University.
      KurdNet is a Kurdish WordNet that was developed by Dr. Sina Ahmadi in 2014 (article).
      Aim of this project was to extend and improve it.

      Privte Repository 2021
    • Personal Website
      a personal website made with jekyll to demonstrate some information like education, experiences, and projects.
      GitHub Repository 2021
    • Music Player with Lyrics
      A web application that can play a music with its lyrics at same time. Lyrics, music, font, background, and colour are changeable.
      (Private Repository) 2021
    • MEMORAL
      stores and shops can use this software for selling products, checking remains, printing reports, and some more features like access level (e.g. manager, seller, …).
      GitHub Repository 2020
    • New Sort of Barcode for Personal Purpose
      making new sort of barcode that apart from QR-Code and 128-code.
      I use openCV library and develop on multi platforms e.g. unity, android studio, … . It can recognize specefic characters that is defined. It can calculate and decode some information from a list of characters.
      (Private Repository) 2018 - current
